WESTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
BRAZIL-SOUTHEAST COAST.
DNC 01.
1. SURVEY OPERATIONS 15 THRU 21 FEB BY
   M/V SW EMPRESS TOWING 12 5556 METER LONG CABLES
   IN AREA BOUND BY
   22-13.32S 040-08.43W, 22-14.19S 039-54.34W,
   22-14.98S 039-54.90W, 22-15.30S 039-55.12W,
   22-15.43S 040-08.32W, 22-14.97S 040-08.35W,
   22-13.80S 040-08.42W.
   WIDE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 22 FEB 22.
